extensionName.message: Send to Kindle for Google Chrome™

extensionDescription.message: Sending and reading web content such as news articles and blog posts to your Kindle device or reading app is now easier than ever.
extensionDescription.description: Extension description for extension UI and download.

optKSInfo.message: To change, click on the box below and choose key combination on your keyboard:
